actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to require daily release by the Secretary of Agriculture of reports of export sales of agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1970 to require daily release by the Secretary of Agriculture of reports of export sales of agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to require daily release by the Secretary of Agriculture of reports of export sales of agricultural commodities.
